title: I Want a Luxe Wardrobe, So I'm Eyeing These On-Sale Cashmere, Satin, and Velvet Pieces for Black Friday
description: Gift these to yourself or someone special.
excerpt: Cashmere, Satin, and Velvet fashion deals during black friday
text: If you're like me, you've probably been searching the internet for the best Black Friday fashion deals over the past few days. Although the big savings event technically ended yesterday, many deals are still going strong. So, I went through my favorite retailers one last time to ensure I didn't miss out on deeply discounted clothing, footwear, or accessories.From Reformation and J.Crew to Nordstrom and even Walmart, I stumbled upon an array of Black Friday fashion deals that featured sumptuous cashmere, satin, and velvet pieces. It felt like a treasure trove filled with delightful finds. I discovered an abundance of cozy cashmere scarves perfect for chilly commutes, elegant velvet dresses that would dazzle at holiday gatherings, and sleek satin shirts that are just right for professional meetings.With that said, keep scrolling to explore the top 25 last-minute Black Friday fashion deals on cashmere, satin, and velvet pieces. These finds are not just incredibly chic but also flying off the shelves quickly!The Best Black Friday Cashmere Sale Finds Caslon Cashmere Crewneck Sweater A best seller for a good reason. Reformation Jadey Cashmere Oversized V-Neck Sweater Who What Wear editors can't stop talking about how nice this sweater is. Nordstrom Rib Cashmere Beanie Take 40% off this soft cashmere beanie. J.Crew Cashmere Classic-Fit Crewneck Sweater J.Crew knows a thing or two about cashmere knits. COS Ribbed Cashmere Socks The chicest way to keep your toes warm. Banana Republic Cashmere Cropped Rugby Sweater Polo Add a pop of color to any look. Nordstrom Rib Wool & Cashmere Throw Blanket This makes such a nice holiday gift for someone on your list. Nordstrom Crewneck Cashmere Sweater You really can't go wrong here. J.Crew Featherweight Cashmere Shrunken Cardigan There's something about a cashmere cardigan that makes me feel very elegant and feminine. The Best Black Friday Satin Sale Finds I thought this top was designer at first. Obsessed with this neckline. Reformation Gale Satin Mid Rise Bias Pant Please don't sleep on these pants. Madewell Relaxed Dolman Button-Up Shirt This top will make any pair of jeans look elegant. Banana Republic Satin Mini Skirt Wear this for a date night or for drink with friends. Scoop Satin Midi Slip Dress Style with knee-high boots and a cropped blazer. Madewell Satin V-Neck Cami Top My entire cold-weather wardrobe is chocolate brown, and I'm not upset about it at all. The Best Black Friday Velvet Sale Finds NASTY GAL Lace Trim Side Slit Velvet Miniskirt Reformation Lindy Knit Top Bring a fresh edge to your winter looks with a velvet going-out top. Reformation Brisbane Velvet Dress If you haven't heard, powder pink will be 2025's hottest hue. H&M Wide-Leg Velvet Pants I'll take this whole outfit, please. Reformation Bella Velvet Skirt This color is perfection. Sofia Jeans by Sofia Vergara Velvet Peplum Strapless Top I never knew I needed a strapless velvet top until I saw this one. Gap Recycled Velvet Maxi Slip Dress Reiss Niva Ruched Sleeveless Velvet Dress I wish I had a winter wedding to wear this to. Nikki Chwatt is an associate fashion editor based in New York City. She joined Who What Wear in 2024 after writing fashion, beauty, and lifestyle content for WWD, Well+Good, Editorialist, and more. With a passion for personal style and the creativity that comes with it, one of Chwatt's goals is to help others understand that there is no such thing as a “good” or “bad” style; it’s just about putting an outfit together that makes you feel confident in yourself. When she's not writing, you can find her taking a Pilates class, reading a powerful romance novel, or exploring a new wellness spot in Manhattan.
html:
If you're like me, you've probably been searching the internet for the best Black Friday fashion deals over the past few days. Although the big savings event technically ended yesterday, many deals are still going strong. So, I went through my favorite retailers one last time to ensure I didn't miss out on deeply discounted clothing, footwear, or accessories.

From Reformation and J.Crew to Nordstrom and even Walmart, I stumbled upon an array of Black Friday fashion deals that featured sumptuous cashmere, satin, and velvet pieces. It felt like a treasure trove filled with delightful finds. I discovered an abundance of cozy cashmere scarves perfect for chilly commutes, elegant velvet dresses that would dazzle at holiday gatherings, and sleek satin shirts that are just right for professional meetings.

With that said, keep scrolling to explore the top 25 last-minute Black Friday fashion deals on cashmere, satin, and velvet pieces. These finds are not just incredibly chic but also flying off the shelves quickly!

The Best Black Friday Cashmere Sale Finds

Caslon

Cashmere Crewneck Sweater

A best seller for a good reason.

Reformation

Jadey Cashmere Oversized V-Neck Sweater

Who What Wear editors can't stop talking about how nice this sweater is.

Nordstrom

Rib Cashmere Beanie

Take 40% off this soft cashmere beanie.

J.Crew

Cashmere Classic-Fit Crewneck Sweater

J.Crew knows a thing or two about cashmere knits.

COS

Ribbed Cashmere Socks

The chicest way to keep your toes warm.

Banana Republic

Cashmere Cropped Rugby Sweater Polo

Add a pop of color to any look.

Nordstrom

Rib Wool & Cashmere Throw Blanket

This makes such a nice holiday gift for someone on your list.

Nordstrom

Crewneck Cashmere Sweater

You really can't go wrong here.

J.Crew

Featherweight Cashmere Shrunken Cardigan

There's something about a cashmere cardigan that makes me feel very elegant and feminine.

The Best Black Friday Satin Sale Finds

I thought this top was designer at first.

Obsessed with this neckline.

Reformation

Gale Satin Mid Rise Bias Pant

Please don't sleep on these pants.

Madewell

Relaxed Dolman Button-Up Shirt

This top will make any pair of jeans look elegant.

Banana Republic

Satin Mini Skirt

Wear this for a date night or for drink with friends.

Scoop

Satin Midi Slip Dress

Style with knee-high boots and a cropped blazer.

Madewell

Satin V-Neck Cami Top

My entire cold-weather wardrobe is chocolate brown, and I'm not upset about it at all.

The Best Black Friday Velvet Sale Finds

NASTY GAL

Lace Trim Side Slit Velvet Miniskirt

Reformation

Lindy Knit Top

Bring a fresh edge to your winter looks with a velvet going-out top.

Reformation

Brisbane Velvet Dress

If you haven't heard, powder pink will be 2025's hottest hue.

H&M

Wide-Leg Velvet Pants

I'll take this whole outfit, please.

Reformation

Bella Velvet Skirt

This color is perfection.

Sofia Jeans by Sofia Vergara

Velvet Peplum Strapless Top

I never knew I needed a strapless velvet top until I saw this one.

Gap

Recycled Velvet Maxi Slip Dress

Reiss

Niva Ruched Sleeveless Velvet Dress

I wish I had a winter wedding to wear this to.

Nikki Chwatt is an associate fashion editor based in New York City. She joined Who What Wear in 2024 after writing fashion, beauty, and lifestyle content for WWD, Well+Good, Editorialist, and more. With a passion for personal style and the creativity that comes with it, one of Chwatt's goals is to help others understand that there is no such thing as a “good” or “bad” style; it’s just about putting an outfit together that makes you feel confident in yourself. When she's not writing, you can find her taking a Pilates class, reading a powerful romance novel, or exploring a new wellness spot in Manhattan.
